verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
Within the veil,
I now would come
Into the Holy Place
To look upon Your face.
I see such beauty there,
None other can compare
I worship You, my Lord,
Within the veil

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Within the veil,
We now would come
Into the Holy Place
To look upon Your face.
We see such beauty there,
None other can compare
We worship You, our Lord,
Within the veil

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Within the veil,
We love to come
Into the Holy Place
To look upon Your face.
We see such beauty there,
None other can compare
We worship You, our Lord,
Within the veil
